titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 2160) making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1998, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-197, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of HR2160 to H.R. 2160. No further amendment shall be in order except those amendments printed in the Congressional Record prior to July 22, 1997. Each amendment shall be debatable for 10 minutes, except for the following amendments which shall be debatable for 30 minutes: The pending Obey amendment, amendment Nos. 17, 3, and 21.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 66.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
Mr. Hall (OH) asked unanimous consent that the time for debate be extended for an additional 10 minutes. Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 202 (Roll no. 306).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/23/1997--Passed House amended. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 2160 (Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs appropriations).
